overview: Tape 1: Mistletoe Mr. Cox & His Nephew Austin Young Austin loves decorating the family vacation house for the holidays...  Tape 2: Xmas Sleepy Time Mr. Cox & His Nephew Austin Late in the night on Christmas Eve, Austin discovers Uncle Mitch...  Tape 3: Xmas Confession Mr. Kamp & His Grandson Maxx It’s Christmas Eve and Maxx is excited, so he can’t help but sneak downstairs—even if he is in his underwear...  Tape 4: Caught Masturbating Mr. Fantana & His Nephew Austin Austin was so excited to hear his uncle Rick was coming to town...  Tape 5: Texting Mishap Mr. Cox & His Boy Oliver It was during one of his encounters with Austin that Mr. Cox first came to question his son’s sexuality...
title: Family Holiday Tradition: Tapes 1-5
